titleInfo.title: 3 Doors Down at the AmSouth Amphitheater

mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and yellow on white) announcing 3 Doors Down with Our lady Peace, Seether, and Shinedown at the AmSouth Amphitheater (previously the Starwood Amphitheater) on July 26.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
